description.narrative: Danish contribution to UNDP Denmark in relation to the implementation of the Ministerial Roundtable on the Central Sahel - responding to Humanitarian Challenge in a Long-Term Perspective, 2020.

Denmark will in collaboration with Germany, the EU (ECHO), and the UN (OCHA and UNDP) host a humanitarian donor conference on the Central Sahel. The conference will consist of a virtual senior officials’ meeting in early September 2020 and a ministerial roundtable in Copenhagen in October 2020 (pending the COVID-19 situation). The objectives of the conference are to (1) mobilise humanitarian and complementary development and resilience resources, (2) galvanise national and international political support, and (3) support the elaboration of a framework of collaboration between humanitarian action, development, and peacebuilding, and propose country-specific roadmaps for sustainable recovery.
Strategic objectives: To host a virtual senior officials meeting and a ministerial roundtable on the humanitarian situation in the Central Sahel in order to gather political momentum and mobilize support from donors.
